roleset.name: strike

role.descr: instrument, object hit by or with

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Based on comparison to beat-v.01, maps to VN class 18.1-1, noun has no FN frame.

example.name: All args
example.text: Earlier this week, former Springfield cop Jeffrey Asher was convicted of assault and battery, resulting from his beating, with a flashlight, of Melvin Jones III.
